issue.title: ipcamtalk.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ipcamtalk.com/forums/blue-iris.30/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fipcamtalk.com%2Fforums%2Fblue-iris.30%2F) ### Comment > This nag popup appears when scrolling the page on any forum on this site. It requires more than one click to get rid of it. When scrolling further on the same page it reappears. With AdGuard turned off this doesn't happen. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lbdcerikf9wocckocsk4sgw4g0skg0spa0hwfgbous.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1gklda2mrhvoggok40cocsgoosk4skkr39b6cxu46s.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://www.reddit.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2F) ### Comment > The set your cookies preferences reminder remains on old.reddit.com or reddit.com (if uing new reddit remains unchecked).
